title: What’s on Google TV: Hulu offers a killer Disney+ deal, Netflix tests more ways to charge you more
content:
This week in home entertainment news, one of 2021’s biggest movies arrived on digital streaming, Disney+ and Hulu launched a killer new bundle deal, and Amazon closed its deal with MGM.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Hulu offers a killer Disney+ deal, Netflix tests more ways to charge you more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Hulu is currently offering a killer deal on a Disney+ bundle, with Disney's service adding just $2.99/month to your existing bill.
